text:
HyperDigtial https://hyper.digital | Senior Full-stack Javascript Developer | Edinburgh, Scotland | Onsite, full-time (Javascript, React)

We are creating original approaches to interactively explore knowledge and information that reveal new insights and experiences of value.

We're a small software company with significant backing from our Berlin based parent company looking to add a fifth developer to the Edinburgh team. All our projects are very visually orientated, built with React, Redux, Immutable.js, WebGL for the front-end with Node.js and Postgresql for the backend.

Further details at: https://hyper.digital/exp-js-dev
